Mr. TURTLE

- The Unmanned Radio Telemetry Limno-Explorer

Welcome to our USV-Project Page

We – a group of master students of Physical Geography and Geoarcheology of Philipps-University Marburg – want to

  • contribute to improve knowledge of the state of river- and lakebeds as well as riparian areas
  • facilitate excess to this knowledge for every citizen
  • introduce a cost-effective Do-it-Your-Self approach, how to take environmental data in this field
  • supply a simple technical guideline combined with basic informatic and UAV-based instructions
by building a remotely controlled swimming platform (Mr. TURTLE) stuffed with a sonar, lidar and several other sensors. This website shows our working procedure and explains how you can get on board!

Get in touch

We are a group of students of Philipps-University Marburg, studying physical geography and geoarchology. The Project is supervised by Prof. Dr. Thomas Nauss and Dr. Christoph Reudenbach

    Umweltinformatik Universität Marburg.
